# Codial
A Social Web Media Website made by using Node, Express and MongoDB.

# Tools and Packages Used

src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/de627a44854be1c5a8a80dbb3321ad9bcaf0b4c662919838af77b7c1df6f60a7/68747470733a2f2f6d69726f2e6d656469756d2e636f6d2f6d61782f3430302f312a5949317474346b477a7665612d76346441685a3930772e706e67" height="150px" width="150px">

1. Node.js
2. Gulp
3. jQuery
4. socket.io
5. MongoDB (Mongoose)
6. Express.js
7. JWT (JsonWebToken)
8. Node SASS Middleware
9. Node Mailer
10. Passport.js

Apart from these tools some other minor tools are also used like Rotating file system, morgan logger middleware, e.t.c.
